name: Impeachment Survivors
description:
It's impeachment time!



- Choose your brazilian president and destroy your opponents;
- Several brazilian presidents to choose from, with unique play styles;
- Choose public policies after defeating waves of opponents, which improve your president;
- Collect taxes and buy new improvements before trying to escape impeachment;
- Lots of Brazilian memes;
- Lots of social criticism.



Impeachment Survivors is an action roguelike, in which you must survive through waves of enemies. At the end of each wave, choose a public policy that improves your president, making him stronger and more immoral. As you shoot down enemies, you receive tax money, enabling you to spend it on improvements before starting another match.

Choose a president from four, each with their own unique play style, and face impeachment.

The game features:
- 7 presidents to choose from;
- 22 different enemies;
- 13 different upgrades to choose from after a wave;
- 2 bosses;
- 2 game modes.
